short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Crazy Taxi is a fun and easy off-road racing game that can be played right on the chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: crazy taxi is a fun and simple game, by controlling the up arrow button to run and the left and right down buttons to control steering, your job is to drive on the road, overcome opponents and win.
